title: 84 How to Be A Man In Today's World (And What Women Can Do to Support) with Brett McKay
description:
"Don't kill the animal within you; just tame him and use him appropriately." - Brett McKay
To learn more about the School of Greatness, head on over to www.lewishowes.com/84
author: podcast@schoolofgreatness.com (Lewis Howes)
